channel.title: Well, It's time for the next step. More questions
channel.description: Here's where I started about a month and a half ago http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466075.msg3408488.html#msg3408488 Since then i have learned quite a bit of java, read a book and developed a few very basic programs( off and on) that had a lot buggs, yeah I'm still a noob :P. I thought though that i am ready to start on my first server though. So I don't need to take up any more of your day with that very touching story here are my questions. 1) My first base, hyperion, Delta, PI? -Not really sure where to start, I mean I don't want to start on something completely blank I have a lot to learn and even know I somewhat understand the java lanuage RSPS's are a different story ( From what I've delt with). So back on topic, first base where should start? 2) Should I download a client with all of the models already added in? ( for excample claws, godswords etc.....) Or would i be skipping to much coding? 3) Any other tips for me? Well if you read all that thanks i could really use some help thanks

item.title: Well, It's time for the next step. More questions
item.dc:creator: @Viety Viety
item.description:
@Viety wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:377471”][quote author=Woopzpkedu link=topic=473368.msg3461557#msg3461557 date=1294522576]
tut section
[/quote]

Please Leave.

@ Original Poster:

  1. Start off with delta until you start to understand the concept of basic rsps programming. Then move into PI. Once you get used to PI, move into something more complex like hyperion.

  2. No, add them yourself. It’s better for you in the longrun

  3. Be creative, and don’t be afraid too experiment! If you need any help just Pm me, or add me on msn

tehclawzfury@hotmail.com[/quote]

Thanks greatly appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: Well, It's time for the next step. More questions

@Viety wrote:

Here’s where I started about a month and a half ago

programming, irc, cars


Since then i have learned quite a bit of java, read a book and developed a few very basic programs( off and on) that had a lot buggs, yeah I’m still a noob :P. I thought though that i am ready to start on my first server though. So I don’t need to take up any more of your day with that very touching story here are my questions.

  1. My first base, hyperion, Delta, PI?
    -Not really sure where to start, I mean I don’t want to start on something completely blank I have a lot to learn and even know I somewhat understand the java lanuage RSPS’s are a different story ( From what I’ve delt with). So back on topic, first base where should start?
  2. Should I download a client with all of the models already added in? ( for excample claws, godswords etc…) Or would i be skipping to much coding?
  3. Any other tips for me?
    Well if you read all that thanks i could really use some help thanks
